entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
